investigator.dark_secret: You secretly gambled away your family fortune at the races last month.
investigator.alibi: I was in the conservatory reading detective novels all evening.

guilty.dark_secret: You poisoned the victim to prevent him from changing the will.
guilty.alibi: I was in my room writing letters to my solicitor.

innocent.dark_secret: You're having an affair with the gardener and were meeting him secretly.
innocent.alibi: I was walking in the garden admiring the roses.
